name: Undead University
description: You’ll be playing as Bo, a student working on an assignment till late at night at Levanger campus.  The Nursing students are gathering material as part of an experiment on fungi cultures, and due to an undetected error, it goes completely wrong. The fungi take over the students and teachers involved in the experiment, resulting in a zombie-like outbreak. By people interacting with others, the fungi spreads, and quickly the majority of the staff and students at the university are infected and acting alarmingly strange and violent.
